Despite our small absence on this forum for some time, we are still well and truly present!

For 2019 Easter, we decide to come back with our latest DeepNet Solutions OpenVZ packages.

All our OpenVZ VPS plans are eligible to a 30% off recurring discount. Simply use the Promo code EASTER2019 .  
**Please take note, all price below are in Canadian Dollars.**

OpenVZ Technology
Montreal, Miami, Los Angeles or London Facility

* Contact our Billing team for all promotion details.
